ValidationRule.description: diaplay error message on case record when SCC_Sub_Description__c on SSC_Call_Type__c object related to case is not empty and on case SCC_Sub_Case__c filed is not selected and case status moved to escalated from new
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "New") && ISBLANK(SCC_Sub_Case__c) && !ISBLANK( SCC_Call_Type__r.SCC_Sub_Description__c ) && (AND(NOT($Permission.By_Pass_Validation_for_Migration), NOT($Profile.Name = 'System Administrator'), NOT( $Profile.Name = 'Salesforce API Only System Integrations'), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Escalated"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Waiting Document"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Disconnected"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Cancelled") ))) && Case_Cutoff__c == TRUE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Silakan mengisi informasi Sub Case terlebih dahulu
